content: Internal error in IG hl7.fhir.uv.sdc#3.0.0 map: No identity found for http://hl7.org/fhir/uv/sdc/StructureDefinition/sdc-questionnaire-assemble-expectation
Also, is SDC going to rev so folks can pin a reference? 2019-03-29 is the most recent published version.
There's so much in CI since then that it's not really practical to use 2.7.0, but running off current is risky.

Like we're blocked on a production release atm because we're referencing current. And "fix current!" doesn't seem like a reasonable answer. That's what current is for... so folks can preview what's coming but not rely on it for production. But that kinda breaks down when there's no release for going on 3 years. :grinning_face_with_smiling_eyes:
Workaround: I was able to fix by deleting the local fhir cache of sdc#current
